casebody.data:
U.S. BANK NATIONAL ASSOCIATION, as Trustee FOR CITIGROUP MORTGAGE LOAN TRUST, INC., MORTGAGE PASS-THROUGH CERTIFICATES SERIES 2006-4
v.
Achyut M. TOPE et al. Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided March 28, 2018

The defendant Achyut M. Tope's petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court (AC 40631) is denied.
